Package eu.tivian.musico.database

Helper classes for dealing with SQLite database.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AlbumCursor
    A database cursor focused on providing the interface for retrieving Album object from database.
    DatabaseAdapter
    A helper class which minimizes the direct communication with the database, to prevent corruption of data.
    DatabaseAdapter.Sort
    Available sorting options for listing all albums.
    DatabaseContract
    Contract class which describes the schema of the database used for this app.
    DatabaseContract.AlbumEntry
    A representation of the schema for table describing albums.
    DatabaseContract.ArtistEntry
    A representation of the schema for table describing artists.
    DatabaseContract.CurrencyEntry
    A representation of the schema for the table of currencies.
    DatabaseContract.GenreEntry
    A representation of the schema for table of genres.
    DatabaseContract.PurchaseEntry
    A representation of the schema for the table of purchases.
    DatabaseContract.SettingsEntry
    A representation of the schema for table of settings.
    DatabaseContract.SongEntry
    A representation of the schema for table containing songs.
    DatabaseContract.StoreEntry
    A representation of the schema for table of stores.
    DatabaseContract.TrackEntry
    A representation of the schema for table of tracks.
    DatabaseHelper
    A helper class to manage database creation and version management.
    DatabaseSuggestion
    An autocomplete engine.
    SimpleStatement
    A simplified version of SQLiteStatement for retrieving single string value from the database.

Package eu.tivian.musico.database Description

Helper classes for dealing with SQLite database.
